meanings.definition: To eat something quickly and noisily.
meanings.sent1: The hungry child was gobbling his food at the dinner table.
meanings.sent2: She was gobbling up the delicious cake at the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was gobbling his treats like they were disappearing magic bones.
meanings.sent4: The vacuum cleaner gobbled up all the crumbs on the carpet.
meanings.sent5: The squirrel was gobbling the nuts with such speed that it seemed like a race.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a turkey.
meanings.sent1: We heard the gobbling of the turkeys on the farm.
meanings.sent2: The loud gobbling of the turkey echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent3: The comical gobbling of the turkey made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gobbling of the turkey filled the Thanksgiving air with joy.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic gobbling of the turkey added a festive touch to the holiday.
